summary: This bill, the "Restoring Confidence in the World Anti-Doping Agency Act of 2025," aims to amend the Office of National Drug Control Policy Reauthorization Act of 2006. It focuses on the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA), requiring the Office of National Drug Control Policy (ONDCP) to ensure WADA's credible governance, implement reforms, and involve independent athletes in decision-making. The ONDCP, in consultation with relevant bodies, will assess WADA's compliance and may withhold dues if necessary. The bill also stresses countering doping, including systemic fraud, and working collaboratively with democratic countries.
